/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, painted in a palette of red, white, and black, navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with shadows subtly hinting at the time of day.
